```{python pubtable}
#| output: asis
fa_github = "{{< fa brands github size=20px >}}"
idx = len(entries)
for entry in entries:
    print("<tr>\n",
          f'<td  style="vertical-align:top">{idx}. ',
          f'<td>{entry.bib} &ensp; [{fa_github}]({entry.github_link}) ',
          f"<td>{entry.dimensions_badge(data_style = 'small_rectangle')} \n\n {entry.altmetric(badge_type = 'medium_badge')}",
          sep = "&ensp; </td>\n",
          end = "</tr>\n")
    idx -= 1
```
